Case Study

AstraZeneca: Harnessing Knowledge

AZ had over 200 million documents. Printed out on paper, that would weigh more than the Titanic. They used over 100 different applications to search them all. That meant over 100 passwords, interfaces and systems to learn and no common way to collate results.

Insight

Innovation != Technology

Businesses are increasingly looking to technology to solve a requirement to innovate. Hack days are now the domain of corporations looking to generate ideas and creativity quickly. But for businesses to really embrace innovation cultural change is far more important than technology.
